resource.chars:
I am inclined to think that these bands 
are what have been described as
‘Hepatic arteries ‘ - at least, there is 
nothing else that could possibly be confounded 
with <s>a hep <\s> an arterial ramification upon
the liver.
This description applies more especially 
to <u>Rhynchonella <\u> & <u>Waldheimia <\u> but 
the arrangement in <u>Lingula <\u> is not 
essentially different.
